author: Master_Wu
title: Nice Minifigures
review:
This Ninjago set is a nice buy but is best for its minifigures: Nya and Zane. They both have some very nice printing on their cool ninja suits. 

As for the build, it is a pretty dull build for a rather useless training piece. It is cool that you can spin the training dummy as the ninjas train, but it's just not a very cool build.

I wanted this set primarily for the minifigures, and would mainly recommend this set for them as well. If your looking for a nice polybag with good play value, I would recommend maybe getting a different set first.
